trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see langword="DrawItem" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see langword="DrawItem" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The `DrawItem` event is raised by owner draw controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: `DrawItem`引發擁有者繪製控制項，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: It contains all the information that is needed for the user to paint the specified item, including the item index, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> on which the drawing should be done.
trans-unit.target: 它包含所有所需的資訊來繪製指定的項目，包括項目索引，使用者<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>，而<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>上應該執行繪圖。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立主控描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>項目。

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性，指定繪製的項目固定的大小和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件以執行每個項目至繪圖<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: 範例程式碼使用的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs>類別當做參數傳遞至事件處理常式繪製項目。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control that is named `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項名為`listBox1`已新增至表單，而且<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件由範例程式碼中定義的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The example also assumes that items have been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會假設項目已加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>以 「 Apple 」、 「 橙色 」，和"梅紅"文字的順序。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 表層。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to use, usually the parent control's <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />，通常是父控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: 要其中繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 範圍。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> index value of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 繪製的項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> 索引值。

trans-unit.source: The control's <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> information.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> 資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs" /> class for the specified control with the specified font, state, surface to draw on, and the bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: 為具有指定字型、狀態、要繪製的介面和界線的指定控制項，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 表層。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to use, usually the parent control's <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />，通常是父控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: 要其中繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 範圍。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> index value of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 繪製的項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> 索引值。

trans-unit.source: The control's <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> information.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> 資訊。

trans-unit.source: The foreground <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> to draw the control with.
trans-unit.target: 要用來繪製控制項的前景 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The background <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> to draw the control with.
trans-unit.target: 要用來繪製控制項的背景 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs" /> class for the specified control with the specified font, state, foreground color, background color, surface to draw on, and the bounds to draw within.
trans-unit.target: 為具有指定字型、狀態、前景色彩、背景色彩、要繪製的介面和界線的指定控制項，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the background color of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 取得所繪製項目的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The background <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 繪製項目的背景 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.BackColor%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目的狀態為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.BackColor%2A>設<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.BackColor%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是項目的狀態<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.BackColor%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表會幫助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> that is named `ListBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，名稱為`ListBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then make sure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式都與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the bounds of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示所繪製項目的界限的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示所繪製項目的界限。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立主控描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>項目。

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性，指定繪製的項目固定的大小和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件以執行每個項目至繪圖<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: 範例程式碼使用的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs>類別當做參數傳遞至事件處理常式繪製項目。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control that is named `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項名為`listBox1`已新增至表單，而且<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件由範例程式碼中定義的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The example also assumes that items have been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會假設項目已加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>以 「 Apple 」、 「 橙色 」，和"梅紅"文字的順序。

trans-unit.source: Draws the background within the bounds specified in the <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.#ctor" /> constructor and with the appropriate color.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.#ctor" /> 建構函式 (Constructor) 中指定的界限內繪製背景，並使用適當的色彩。

trans-unit.source: If the item being drawn is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected>, the background is drawn with the text highlighted.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目所繪製<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected>，以反白顯示的文字繪製背景。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立主控描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>項目。

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are a fixed size and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性，指定繪製的項目是固定的大小和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件以執行每個項目至繪圖<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: 範例程式碼使用的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs>類別當做參數傳遞至事件處理常式繪製項目。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control named `listBox1` was added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler that is defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項，名為`listBox1`已加入至表單，而且<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件由範例程式碼中定義的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The example also assumes that items were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum", in that order.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會假設項目已加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>含有文字的"Apple"，"梅紅 」，「 橙色 」，依此順序。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.DrawBackground" /> in a derived class, make sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.DrawBackground" /> method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.DrawBackground" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.DrawBackground" />基底類別的方法。

trans-unit.source: Draws a focus rectangle within the bounds specified in the <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.#ctor" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.#ctor" /> 建構函式中指定的界限內繪製焦點矩形 (Focus Rectangle)。

trans-unit.source: If the item being drawn has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Focus>, the focus rectangle is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目所繪製<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Focus>，繪製焦點矩形。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立主控描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>項目。

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are a fixed size and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性，指定繪製的項目是固定的大小和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件以執行每個項目至繪圖<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: 範例程式碼使用的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs>類別當做參數傳遞至事件處理常式繪製項目。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control named `listBox1` was added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler that is defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項，名為`listBox1`已加入至表單，而且<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件由範例程式碼中定義的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The example also assumes that items were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum", in that order.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會假設項目已加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>含有文字的"Apple"，"梅紅 」，「 橙色 」，依此順序。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle" /> in a derived class, make sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle" /> method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle" />基底類別的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the font that is assigned to the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 取得指派給所繪製項目的字型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> that is assigned to the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 指派給所繪製項目的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: A suggested <xref:System.Drawing.Font>, usually the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property of the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 建議<xref:System.Drawing.Font>，通常是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>父控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立主控描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>項目。

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are a fixed size and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性，指定繪製的項目是固定的大小和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件以執行每個項目至繪圖<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: 範例程式碼使用的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs>類別當做參數傳遞至事件處理常式繪製項目。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control named `listBox1` was added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler that is defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項，名為`listBox1`已加入至表單，而且<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件由範例程式碼中定義的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The example also assumes that items were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum", in that order.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會假設項目已加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>含有文字的"Apple"，"梅紅 」，「 橙色 」，依此順序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the foreground color of the of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 取得所繪製項目的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The foreground <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 所繪製項目的前景 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.ForeColor%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目的狀態為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.ForeColor%2A>設<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the item's state is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.ForeColor%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是項目的狀態<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState.Selected>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.ForeColor%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表會幫助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> that is named `ListBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，名稱為`ListBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then make sure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式都與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the graphics surface to draw the item on.
trans-unit.target: 取得項目繪製其上的圖形介面。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> surface to draw the item on.
trans-unit.target: 項目繪製其上的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立主控描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>項目。

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are a fixed size and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性，指定繪製的項目是固定的大小和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件以執行每個項目至繪圖<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: 範例程式碼使用的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs>類別當做參數傳遞至事件處理常式繪製項目。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control named `listBox1` was added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler that is defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項，名為`listBox1`已加入至表單，而且<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件由範例程式碼中定義的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The example also assumes that items were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum", in that order.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會假設項目已加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>含有文字的"Apple"，"梅紅 」，「 橙色 」，依此順序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index value of the item that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 取得所繪製項目的索引值。

trans-unit.source: The numeric value that represents the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item(System.Int32)" /> value of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 數值，表示所繪製項目的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item(System.Int32)" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item%2A> value of the item being drawn in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Item%2A>繪製項目的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This property can return -1 if itemswere removed from the list.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以傳回-1，如果 itemswere 從清單中移除。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立主控描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>項目。

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are a fixed size and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性，指定繪製的項目是固定的大小和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件以執行每個項目至繪圖<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: 範例程式碼使用的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs>類別當做參數傳遞至事件處理常式繪製項目。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control named `listBox1` was added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler that is defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項，名為`listBox1`已加入至表單，而且<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件由範例程式碼中定義的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The example also assumes that items were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum", in that order.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會假設項目已加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>含有文字的"Apple"，"梅紅 」，「 橙色 」，依此順序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 取得所繪製項目的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> that represents the state of the item being drawn.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" />，表示所繪製項目的狀態。

trans-unit.source: This property value can be a combination of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState> enumeration members.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性值可以是組合的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState>列舉成員。

trans-unit.source: The members can be combined by using bitwise operators.
trans-unit.target: 成員可以使用位元運算子結合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表會幫助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> that is named `ListBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，名稱為`ListBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then make sure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式都與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
